snippet: Rory McIlroy, seeking a strong performance at this week’s BMW Championship to help him qualify for the Tour Championship, is working to bolster his short game and his self-belief.
abstract: Rory McIlroy, seeking a strong performance at BMW Championship golf tournament to help him qualify for season-ending Tour Championship, is working to bolster his short game and his self-belief.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, seeking a strong performance at this week’s BMW Championship to help him qualify for the Tour Championship, is working to bolster his short game and his self-belief.

headline.main: McIlroy Trying to Salvage a Season of Lost Confidence
headline.print_headline: McIlroy Trying to Salvage A Season of Lost Confidence
